phrases: Gotcha!
Stick with your close range weapons!
but the goblins might be stronger than us.
How many of us are there?
It looks almost like a castle rather than a town.
Familiar or not, I cannot remember anybody...
Excuse me, does anybody know where we are?
You can call me Chief.
Or Bri, but only if you say it affectionately.
Give us answers.
You want to find out for yourself?
In time.
And then I will get you good.
You should be able to live off of it for the time being.
I do not have my cell phone either.
I adore fast learners.
We spent eight silvers to join a guild, so we each have two silvers left.
One silver equals one hundred coppers...
so even if we use the minimum for living expenses, we will only last about two weeks.
You should feel honored.
This is great to watch, you hear?
Keep going!
Of course.
What the heck are you doing, Haruhiro?
Get'them and stab!
Stick'them!
It is not that easy!
It is not like you are
S-Sorry!
We will hit allies with arrows if this turns into a melee!
Use swords!
S-Sorry!
Ma-Marque, Them
Parc.
Are you okay?
Can you stand?
I-I am sorry...
I will heal you, just in case.
O light, return to Lumiaris' divine protection.
Cure!
S-Sorry!
This is a battle of life or death!
Everybody!
Both us and the goblins are fighting a real battle for our lives!
It does not get more serious than this!
No living thing wants to die!
We are all out of breath, even though we have not exerted ourselves much.
What is going on?!
Are not goblins the weakest monsters in Grimgar?
Yeah, they are supposed to be...
I do not want to admit it...
Awaken.
Awaken.
Awaken.
How long are you going to sleep, Haruhiro?
The sun's high.
It is the morning.
Are not you forgetting something?
The morning.
Cock-a-doodle-doo.
What is with the sleepy eyes?
I was born with eyes like this.
It does not mean I am sleepy, I have told you before!
Liar, no doubt you are still sleepy.
Hey, you awake?
Once you both get dressed, will you come to the courtyard?
It is time for breakfast.
Oh no...
I was on breakfast duty...
Do not worry, I switched with you.
You seemed pretty tired from yesterday's fight.
Sorry about that, Manato.
You do not seem that sorry, Haruhiro.
Are not you on duty, too?
You should go.
Well...
When I woke up Moguzo had traded with me.
What?
I cannot believe you can still harp on me.
It is obvious.
If you do not get up, I will not get my morning grub.
It is starting to smell mighty good.
I enjoy cooking.
I rather enjoy taste-testing, too!
Yume, Moguzo.
I gathered these on our way back yesterday.
Will these work as additional ingredients?
I-I can...
Then, Shihoru, I will leave it to you.
Is it a little under-salted?
I think it is yummy.
Salt's also pretty pricey...
Let us try to be frugal until we are able to earn money.
I mean, we have not even defeated one monster.
Oh, yeah...
Haruhiro and Ranta, are you both okay?
My Light Magic can heal wounds, but it will not replenish lost blood.
No problems here.
I am fit as a fiddle.
I get a little dizzy, but I am okay.
Great.
Why do not we try the forest today again?
We were against two goblins yesterday.
That might be too hard for us right now.
Let us try going for a loner.
That will take too long.
If we keep running, it will take forever to accumulate my first Vices.
Renji and his group are moving ahead without hiccups, too.
It is better than overdoing it and getting hurt like yesterday.
This is not a game.
A game?
Manato, what is a game?
But I just used that word, huh.
It felt like the right thing at the time, but...
Game...
Things like this happen to us sometimes.
We impulsively use words that seem familiar, but we do not know the meaning of them.
It makes us uneasy, like when something gets a little stuck in your throat and you cannot get it out.
When I first came to the world of Grimgar...
Well, I do not actually know where I came from either.
Anyway, I will tell you about my oldest memory.
It was actually only from a couple of days ago.
Awaken.
I cannot remember anything from before this.
I did not know why I was here...
Is anybody there?
Y-Yeah.
I am here.
Yeah.
Likewise...
How many of us?
Let us count?
Where are we, anyway?
Man, no one here knows?
What is up with this?
What the heck is this?
That over there... you think it is a town?
Rather than a town...
I do not see any familiar faces.
Did you just say something?
No... nothing.
Rather than familiar...
This is odd...
I cannot remember anybody.
Not my friends, family, anybody...
Where... is this place?
Excuse me, does anybody know?!
Where...
I know!
We can ask them.
Look, we can ask those guys wearing all that armor stuff.
This is the town of Ortana.
The name's Brittany.
I am chief and host of the Red Moon office of the Volunteer Soldier Squad for Ortana's Borderland Brigade.
Calling me Chief if fine and all, but Bri-chan is okay too.
However in that case you better say it veeery affectionately.
Got it?
Answer my question.
What the heck are the Borderland Brigade and the Volunteer Soldier Squad?
Why am I here?
Demanding are you?
I do not mind ones like you.
It is Renji.
And I do not like pervy guys like you
Renji, let me tell you something.
No one has called me perverted and lived long.
Want To try?
Well, try and get me if you can, Pervy Chief.
When time comes.
I will get you good, I will get you very good.
You will not be able to forget me after that.
Ten silver coins.
There are ten silvers in here per person.
I will give a bag to those who join the Volunteer Soldier Squad.
It should be enough for the time being.
Oh yeah, money...
No phone either...
Phone?
Huh, what is a cell phone?
Look here.
This is proof that you are a trainee, priced at twenty silver coins.
For twenty more, you can buy an official badge that comes with its own benefits.
We have to buy them?
Either way, if you are not strong enough, you will die.
Die?
I did not realize this conversation was so serious.
What, exactly, do we need to do?
My dear Renji, you disappoint me.
You will defeat enemies by gathering information with your own wits and discernment.
That is the way of a Volunteer Soldier.
So basically, we need to find out things and think for ourselves for everything?
Exactly.
I love such fast learners.
After you defeat a monster, take all the spoils and sell them.
These are basics.
Do not think that there are other types of menial labor to do.
It is a different story if you want to become a little pet of mine.
Living has its own challenges.
I will give you just one piece of advice.
Do not give up.
Yes, when you die, you die, but if you give up, you are definitely going to die.
That, I am sure of.
Congratulations.
Starting today, you are all Volunteer Soldier trainees.
In the borderlands of this world called Grimgar...
The Borderland Brigade's mission is to clear them out and suppress them.
But in reality, the regular army has their hands full with maintaining Ortana and the forts on the front line.
So that is why Volunteer Soldiers like us are needed.
Well, we are still trainees, though.
Renji and his party have already bought official Borderland Brigade badges from Bri-chan.
It seems you can trade monster items like horns and claws for a high price.
Twenty silvers still seem pretty expensive.
Meat!
I want some meat!
Some hearty stuff that I can sink my teeth into!
They cost four coppers.
Be patient until we can actually earn our living.
You just wait!
I am going to eat everything in sight!
I will clean out the stands, bones and all!
I do not think you should eat the bones...
Or the stand.
Do not sweat the small stuff, you will only tire yourself out.
Now that I think about it, I am getting more tired just talking to you.
You are so weak.
It makes you so useless!
No good.
No good for anything!
And you are strong, Ranta?
He does not look it.
I am strong.
Even when I was a babe, I was famous for my hidden strength!
If you were famous for it, there was nothing hidden about it.
That day, Renji chose some of the stronger people and set out from Bri-chan's office.
The rest of us formed a party, but truthfully, I think there is a difference in our strength.
We spent eight silvers to join a guild.
Each have two silvers left.
One silver equals one hundred coppers, so even if we use bare minimum, we will only last about two weeks.
If we do not want to camp out, let us spend carefully for the time being.
In order to work in this world, you need to join a guild.
Manato found this out for us, too.
As a party, we discussed and decided what roles to take and sought out to join our respective guilds.
You say you want to join my Thief Guild?
Yes... that is what I came to do.
Um...
Huh...?
Now this is rare.
You are choosing to be a Thief as your first job even though you are just a Volunteer Soldier trainee?
Did you decide all by yourself?
I-I talked with my party leader, Manato.
Hmm...
A-And I thought that someone like me could only make himself useful as a Thief
Ow!
You are hurting me!
Everyone realizes the value of having a Thief in your party once you are an experienced Volunteer Soldier.
The first part of your training takes seven days.
You will go one-on-one with me.
Feel honored.
If you are reluctant, I can let someone else train you.
N-No, please!
I insist!
Just to let you know, I am strict.
I will punish you if you cannot keep up.
Please go easy on me.
YOU-Um, should I call you Teacher?
Oh my, you will call me Teacher?
That has a nice ring to it.
Uh, er, I
Thieves get nicknames, you see.
After you complete your training, I will give you a nice little nickname.
O-Okay.
I am Barbara.
It seems like we will have a fun week.
Teacher Barbara was always beautiful and sexy, but she was more sadistic than a sadist and was merciless.
Despite that, she gave me a nickname at the end.
So my nickname is Old Cat?
It is because you always have the sleepy eyes of an elderly cat.
I was born like this...
And so, I became a Thief.
Moguzo became a Warrior.
Ranta, a Dark Knight.
Yume, a Hunter.
Shihoru, a Magician.
And Manato became a Priest.
I am not used these clothes yet...
Frankly, I feel embarrassed wearing them.
Are you okay, Yume?
Yeah, it just went down wrong.
Y-You should eat a little more slowly.
I do not know why, but I always rush when I eat.
Master would always tell me, Yume, it is bad if you do not eat slowly.
Was it not worded like that...?
Maybe master said Eat slowly?
Can you use a bow and arrow properly with a personality like this?
You seem super unfit to be a Hunter.
Master did say that archery might be too tough for me.
I was a bad shot, no matter how much I trained.
Yeah, it was dangerous yesterday!
Well, sorry.
I might have been thinking it would be okay to hit you.
What did you say?!
I was the one you almost hit, though.
Unforgivable.
Especially since you are flat-chested.
Flat-chested?
I only forgive people like Shihoru who try to disguise their large boobs.
Eh?!
S Sorry!
Th-That is okay.
You cannot fool me even if you hide them.
I can usually tell even if they are spread or flattened!
What kind of skill is that?
It is not a skill!
This is a gift from the heavens!
An ability!
It is just because...
I am fat.
You do not seem fat to me.
M-My clothes just hide it...
Oh...
Shihoru, are you the type of girl that other girls do not like?
Girls hate other girls who call themselves fat even though they are not the most.
It seems like guys and girls alike hate you, though.
Not just guys and girls, the whole world!
I am world-class!
And you are okay with that?
Do not act like a saint, Haruhiro.
You were looking at Shihoru's chest earlier, too.
I saw you.
I saw you dearly, with my mind's eye.
Th-That just means you did not see anything.
Really, I do not...
I really... am fat.
I didn'twait, it is not something to cry over.
I am not crying!
You clearly are!
I definitely see tears dripping down.
Do not you worry, Shihoru.
What are you aiming at me for?
I do not think I will miss this shot.
Obviously!
You are freakin' close!
You know Shihoru, you look skinny, but you are actually pretty soft.
Please do not touch me... it is embarrassing.
You smell good, too.
Yeah, you smell so good.
N-No way... s-smell?
Let us see how it feels to touch them...!
Th-This is a feast for my eyes...!
Hey, you hear?!
Keep going!
Sorry to break up the fun...
It will not be safe after sundown.
And it gets pitch-black.
Dangerous monsters will be out, too.
What is taking you guys so long?
Fast!
You change gears just like that, huh.
Naturally.
I am a man who makes precise choices about time, place, and people.
People call me Master of Choices.
I am going to be King of the Choices!
One, two, three... four of them!
Yeah...
Yume, you will give us away!
But, the Gobs are eating yummier food than mine!
Day thirteen in Grimgar.
We did not earn any money today either.
Our wallets are a little
No.
Very empty.
I am hungry.
After today, tomorrow will come again.
Maybe I have been taking that for granted.
But now...
It is not... easy, huh...
Hm?
No.
Nothing.
Repeating a yesterday filled with scrapes,
We clear the path to a hopeful tomorrow.
I wonder what remains
in both these tiny hands?
The voice I raised upwards scattered into the air.
The reality I have gamed is hazy,
and even if I cannot see ahead of me,
I can keep moving forward on this long road
if I am with you.
Connecting a bond covered in dust,
We join back to back in the past and future.
Repeating an answer full of mistakes,
I will reach out my hands to seek the light, again and again.
